CustomObject.description: Logical grouping of vendor program configurations that share requirement sets, rules, and stage dependencies; used by the onboarding wizard for selection and inheritance. Example: A "Healthcare Vendor Programs" group might contain multiple Vendor Programs (Vendor_Customization__c records) like "Medicare Provider" and "Medicaid Provider" that share the same requirement sets and status evaluation rules. Programs within a group can inherit configurations from each other based on Logic_Type__c settings.
CustomObject.label: Vendor Program Group
